sentences.en: A semicolon was found after a control statement that contains no instructions.
sentences.cn: 在不包含任何指令的控制语句后找到了分号.

sentences.en: An empty statement. Indicated by a single semicolon.
sentences.cn: 空白的语句. 其语法形式为单个分号.

sentences.en: Edit the file, and add the semicolon, if necessary.
sentences.cn: 编辑该文件并添加分号（如果有必要）。

sentences.en: Generally, you can use any delimiter, such as TAB, semicolon etc.
sentences.cn: 一般来说, 您可以使用任何分隔符号, 如标签, 分号等.

sentences.en: If you put a comma where that semicolon is, you will have committed a "comma splice," which is a very nasty grammar error indeed.
sentences.cn: 如果你在这个应该放分号的地方用了逗号，你便犯了“逗号粘连”的错误，这实在是一个非常讨厌的语法错误。

sentences.en: Multiple permissions should have a semicolon (; ) to separate them.
sentences.cn: 多个许可之间应该用分号 ( semicolon ) 分隔开.

sentences.en: Multiple roles should have a semicolon ( ; ) to separate them.
sentences.cn: 多个角色之间应该用分号分隔开.

sentences.en: Semicolon at the last line terminates the rule.
sentences.cn: 最后一行用分号结束该规则.

sentences.en: Separate multiple warning numbers with a comma or semicolon.
sentences.cn: 用逗号或分号分隔多个警告号.

sentences.en: Specifies a semicolon - delimited list of directories to clean.
sentences.cn: 指定要清理的以分号分隔的目录列表.

sentences.en: Specify comma, tab, semicolon, or another character.
sentences.cn: 指定逗号 、 制表符 、 分号或其它字符.

sentences.en: The entire statement is terminated with a semicolon after the closing parenthesis.
sentences.cn: 语句以末尾括号后的分号结束.

sentences.en: The recipients'mail address should not include any comma, semicolon or sign.
sentences.cn: 收咭人电邮不可包含逗号 、 分号或符号.

sentences.en: The semicolon indicates the end of the list of enabled drives.
sentences.cn: 分号表示被启用的磁带机列表的结束.

sentences.en: The semicolon is an or operator between each function definition.
sentences.cn: 分号是每个函数定义之间的 “或” 操作符。

sentences.en: The string must be valid PHP code and must end with semicolon.
sentences.cn: 这个字符串必须是有效的PHP代码,并且必须以分号结束.

sentences.en: We don't use the semicolon in our tutorials.
sentences.cn: 在我们的教程中将不使用到分号.

trans.tran_en: a  punctuation mark  (;) used to separate different parts of a sentence or list
